title: 【Find the Button: Villages】寻找按钮（村庄版）【1.12/1.14/1.16】
author: 爱心魔王FHC
txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱心魔王FHC 于 2021-1-20 21:04 编辑 

Find the Button: Villages　　Have you already played find the button? The game consists of you find the button hidden in the level to continue in the game, each level presents a different phase. It is very cool!
　　Each level has a different village than the new Minecraft Village and Pillage update.
　　Try to find the hidden button on the levels to move on to the next !!
　　There are 8 different levels with different villages in your specific biome, you will have to find the hidden button at each level, some more difficult than the other, will you be able to find them all? Good luck!　　你玩过寻找按钮的游戏吗？每一关都有隐藏的按钮，找到并按下他就能进入下一关卡，每个关卡的地图都是不同的村庄，包括最新的掠夺更新。找到按钮并开启下一关吧！！
　　总共有8个关卡，分布在不同生态系统的村庄中。你需要找出隐藏的按钮，某些特别难找，你能全部找到吗？祝你好运！作者: Pixell Team
